Title: Wakakusa Monogatari: Nan to Jo-sensei Specials
Description: ['A summary of the ', Wakakusa Monogatari: Nan to Jo-sensei, ' full series aired as a TV specials.', ' ', ' ', ' ', " Nan Harding is the new student at Mr. and Mrs. Bhaer's school. Everyone thinks that she is a pain in the head, but not Mrs. Jo. Together with the other kids, they all embark on their personal adventures and misfortunes while learning in school.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
